original_title: School cut-off marks of 2023 Grade 5 Scholarship exam released
original_body_lines: The school cut-off marks for the admission of students to Grade 06 of the schools based on the results of the 2023 Grade 5 Scholarship Examination have been released by the Ministry of Education.
Accordingly, the ministry said the students can check the schools that they have been selected to, using the following link starting February 05: https://g6application.moe.gov.lk/#/
